overview: When mysterious circumstances cause the dead to rise from their graves, a man and woman are trapped in a never-ending hell-inferno.  Film-master, Sir Jeremy Gillespie, brings you Inferno Of The Dead; the darkest vision of horror. Everywhere you hide, any way you turn, this is the curse from which there is no escape.
tagline: The walking dead become a living nightmare.
title: Inferno of the Dead
